duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide care to women during labor and childbirth, including monitoring and supporting the mother and baby.
Assist with emergency caesarean sections and other medical procedures as needed.
Communicate with patients and their families to provide information, support, and guidance throughout the childbirth process.
Document patient information and care provided accurately and in a timely manner using electronic medical records (EMR) systems.
Collaborate with other healthcare professionals to ensure the best possible outcomes for mother and baby.
Maintain a calm and supportive environment for laboring mothers and their families.
Adhere to hospital policies, procedures, and safety regulations at all times.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Nursing (BSN) or equivalent certification
